name: subvariety
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type that forms part of a more general type: This grape is a subvariety of the Pinot Noir grape. A number of sub-varieties have been recognized. Synonym
subtype
More examplesFewer examplesThis subvariety of English is influenced by Indian English.Therapies need to be developed for every variety and subvariety of cancer.The wood can be divided into two sub-varieties depending on its texture and colour.This subvariety of rice has been saved from extinction.
